Yeboah Amankwah (amụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2000) bụ onye bọọlụ bọọlụ nke bọọlụ bụ onye bekee nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu Belgian First Division B Lommel
Amankwah sonyeere Manchester City site na Croydon based Charity Kinetic Academy na Disemba 2016
O sonyeere Njikọ Otu Rochdale na Septemba 2020 na mbinye ego ruo njedebe nke oge 2020–21
O mere mpụta izizi ọkachamara ya na 8 Septemba na mmeri 2–1 EFL Trophy na Morecambe, na-egwu nkeji 72 mbụ nke egwuregwu ahụ
Otu izu ka e mesịrị, ọ gbara egwuregwu 2-0 n'ụlọ Sheffield Wednesday na EFL Cup, mana ọ nwere mmerụ ikpere n'egwuregwu ahụ nke mere ka ọ cheta na mbinye ego ya n'ọnwa na-esote.
Ọ kwagara na mgbazinye na Accrington Stanley n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021.
Amankwah bịanyere aka na Lommel na Septemba 2022.
